text: Si a tawdaama e maɓɓe a darnanii ɓe julde, yo fedde goo e maɓɓe darodo e maaɗa yo ɓe jogito jogaaji maɓɓe ɗin ; si ɓe sujjii, yo ɓe wonu ɓaawo mon, yo fedde ndeya nde juulaali aru, yo ɓe juulidu e maaɗa yo ɓe jogito reetorɗi maɓɓe ɗin e jogaaji maɓɓe ɗin. Yedduɓe ɓen yelinoke sinno on welsindotono gaay e jogaaji mon ɗin e doŋle mon ɗen, ɓe ooñoo e mooɗon ooñannde wootere. Bakkaatu fawaaki on si ɗon wonndi e lorra immorde e toɓo, maa on laatike nawnuɓe nde walliŋton jogaaji mon ɗin. Jogitee reŋtorɗi mon ɗin. Pellet, Alla Hebilanii heeferɓe ɓen lepte hoynooje
